EmailTemplate.description: Email sent as an update to the complainant
EmailTemplate.name: Check-In Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Update regarding your environmental complaint
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DO NOT REPLY TO THIS MESSAGE.
Dear {!Complaints__c.Complainant__r.Name},
This message relates to the environmental complaint number {!Complaints__c.Name} you submitted to the California Environmental Protection Agency (CalEPA) on {!Complaints__c.Actual_Receive_Date__c}. Your complaint is being handled by the following agencies: [[IndividualBDOs]] Your complaint is still being investigated. We will notify you once the complaint has been closed. < Thank you.
